detectors.description:
SafeMath.sub(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YfDAIlock.sol#23-26) has assert violation
	Assert violations:
	- assert(bool)(b <= a) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YfDAIlock.sol#24)

Reentrancy in YfDAIlock.claim() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YfDAIlock.sol#100-109):
	External calls:
	- contractBalance = YfDAI(tokenAddress).balanceOf(address(this)) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YfDAIlock.sol#102)
	- require(bool,string)(YfDAI(tokenAddress).transfer(owner,amountToSend),Could not transfer Tokens.) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YfDAIlock.sol#107)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lastClaimedTime = now (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YfDAIlock.sol#108)
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [YfDAIlock.claim()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YfDAIlock.sol#L100-L109):
	External calls:
	- [contractBalance = YfDAI(tokenAddress).balanceOf(address(this))](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YfDAIlock.sol#L102)
	- [require(bool,string)(YfDAI(tokenAddress).transfer(owner,amountToSend),Could not transfer Tokens.)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YfDAIlock.sol#L107)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [lastClaimedTime = now](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YfDAIlock.sol#L108)
